superintendent.translation[0].definition: a high rank in the British police, or someone who has this rank
someone who is in charge of all the schools in a particular area in the US
someone who is officially in charge of a place, job, activity etc
the superintendent of the Methodist Church in Hawaii
someone who is in charge of an apartment building and is responsible for making repairs in it
superintendent.translation[1].definition: someone who is officially in charge of a place or area of work
Things got worse when the superintendent left to start a competing business.
